call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - September 19th 2024

commitments.quote: Later today, I will release another DevNet, so DevNet 1

commitments.commitment: Make announcement in developers channel for contract review
commitments.quote: after that, I'll probably make an announcement in the developers channel

commitments.commitment: Create off-chain bot in Go and make it open source
commitments.quote: I want to try to do is make an off-chain bot in Go. And of course, it'll be open source
Yeah, yeah, for sure. I'll try to record them

open_questions.question: Need help for contract review and testing for Ergonames
open_questions.context: Contracts are complex with 6-7 contracts working together

open_questions.question: Need to analyze security for atomic chain proposal due to spam possibilities
open_questions.context: Spam possibilities when announcing chain but not delivering part of it intentionally

open_questions.question: Need to write proposal and analyze security for sub-blocks
open_questions.context: Need proofs for security for new construction to not lower the bar

key_facts.fact: Ergonames contracts consist of about six or seven contracts working together
key_facts.speaker: mgPai

key_facts.fact: Completed end-to-end test from commit reveal to actual Ergo name mint
key_facts.speaker: mgPai

key_facts.fact: DevNet 1 will have support for new data structure, signed big integer for cryptographic applications, and higher order functions
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Text updates are now translated to Russian, Spanish, Vietnamese with more languages coming
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Trade House was recently launched as a peer-to-peer order book based decentralized exchange
key_facts.speaker: kushti
